data.eml:eml: Martensopoda gen. nov. from southern Indian mountain ranges, the first genus of huntsman spiders with a cymbial spur (Araneae: Sparassidae: Heteropodinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jäger, Peter (2006): Martensopoda gen. nov. from southern Indian mountain ranges, the first genus of huntsman spiders with a cymbial spur (Araneae: Sparassidae: Heteropodinae). Zootaxa 1325: 335-345, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174020
